title: Extended Side Angle
description: Hip openers, Standing Primary body parts engaged Glutes & Hip Flexors, Obliques, Quadriceps, Shoulders Strengthens legs and ankles, stretches groins and shoulders Stimulates abdominal organs How to perform Extended Side Angle Begin standing.
